Articles.Content:
i was just wondering i was going to buy this, for 15 bucks, or what ever it is in pounds... if i buy via paypal can i download the latest build, or do i have to have it sent?

also i noticed the address was in mexico..... is this correct?

Cheers

Oliver

i was just wondering i was going to buy this, for 15 bucks, or what ever it is in pounds... if i buy via paypal can i download the latest build, or do i have to have it sent?

Welcome to the forums!

You have to download the GAME from the website when you buy it so shipping info is not needed (until Squad comes out with kerbin plushes)

Hope this helps.

Cheers,

Cooly568
you gotta download the game from the website

also i noticed the address was in mexico..... is this correct?

Cheers

Oliver

Squad are indeed in Mexico, their have been a few posts in the past inquiring as to how they held up in the recent earthquakes.
